title: EBSI Verifiable Presentation
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Presentation

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Presentation

holder.description: Defines unique identifier of the party who shares the Verifiable Presentation

verifiableCredential.description: Contains the personal information intended to be shared

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

challenge.description: Defines a random or pseudo-random value used by some authentication protocols to mitigate replay attacks

domain.description: Defines a string value that specifies the operational domain of a digital proof

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format
